entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Showers ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount possibly more than 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 16 February 2023
